alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 4:08PM PST until December 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches over the higher passes with 12 to 18 inches over the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass, Highway 50 over Echo Summit and Highway 88 over Carson Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow covered road conditions. The hazardous conditions could make holiday weekend mountain travel very difficult with delays and chain controls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 7000 feet this evening, lowering to around 5,500 to 6,000 feet late tonight and Saturday morning. Heaviest amounts expected tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
